sentences.en: Bess was self-conscious about being shorter than her two friends.
sentences.cn: 贝丝因比她的两个朋友个子都矮而感到很不自在。

sentences.en: Environmentally-conscious Germans are worried about the pollution the car produces.
sentences.cn: 关注环境的德国人对汽车造成的污染十分担心。

sentences.en: He was conscious of that vague feeling of irritation again.
sentences.cn: 他再次感到有点儿恼火。

sentences.en: He was conscious of the faint, musky aroma of after-shave.
sentences.cn: 他意识到剃须后有淡淡的麝香味。

sentences.en: I became conscious of someone watching me.
sentences.cn: 我察觉到有人在监视我。

sentences.en: I felt a bit self-conscious in my swimming costume.
sentences.cn: 我穿着游泳衣觉得有点害羞。

sentences.en: I felt so self-conscious under Luke's mother's intense gaze.
sentences.cn: 在卢克母亲审视的目光下，我感到极不自在。

sentences.en: In their presence I became self-conscious and tongue-tied.
sentences.cn: 当着他们的面，我有些难为情，说不出话来。

sentences.en: Make a conscious effort to relax your muscles.
She was conscious of a troubled expression on Ann's face.
sentences.cn: 她注意到了安脸上露出了苦恼的表情。

sentences.en: She was conscious of being very near to tears.
sentences.cn: 她意识到自己快哭出来了。

sentences.en: She was very conscious of Max studying her.
sentences.cn: 她非常清楚马克斯在仔细端详她。

sentences.en: The driver was still conscious when the ambulance arrived.
sentences.cn: 救护车赶到时，司机仍然神志清醒。

sentences.en: The fashion-conscious will go for anything under the sun!
Their range of leisurewear is aimed at fashion-conscious 13 to 25 year-olds.
sentences.cn: 他们的休闲服系列瞄准的是追求时髦的13到25岁青少年。

sentences.en: Today's organic wine producer is typically a small, quality-conscious family concern.
sentences.cn: 现今的有机葡萄酒生产商一般是注重品质的小型家族企业.

sentences.en: We have made a conscious effort to devolve responsibility.
sentences.cn: 我们已有意识地下放职责。

trans.tran_cn: 意识到的，神志清醒的，慎重的，关注的
